casebody.data:
Albert BONHAM, Jr., and Marilyn Bonham, co-administrators ad litem of the estate of Albert Dewayne Bonham, deceased
v.
STATE EX REL. Walt M. MERRELL III, District Attorney of Covington County 2160041 Court of Civil Appeals of Alabama. February 24, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
